name: api_terrain_TerrainData
description: The TerrainData class stores heightmaps, detail mesh positions, tree instances, and terrain texture alpha maps.

properties.name: alphamapHeight
properties.description: Height of the alpha map. (Read only.)

properties.name: alphamapLayers
properties.description: Number of alpha map layers.

properties.name: alphamapResolution
properties.description: The size of the alpha map in texels for either the width or the height.

properties.name: alphamapTextureCount
properties.description: Returns the number of alphamap textures.

properties.name: alphamapTextures
properties.description: Alpha map textures used by the Terrain. Used by Terrain Inspector for undo.

properties.name: alphamapWidth
properties.description: Width of the alpha map.

properties.name: baseMapResolution
properties.description: Resolution of the base map used for rendering far patches on the terrain.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The local bounding box of the TerrainData object.

properties.name: detailHeight
properties.description: The resolution of the detail data stored in TerrainData.

properties.name: detailPatchCount
properties.description: The number of patches along a terrain tile edge. This is squared to make a grid of patches.

properties.name: detailPrototypes
properties.description: Contains the detail texture/meshes that the Terrain has.

properties.name: detailResolution
properties.description: Detail Resolution of the TerrainData.

properties.name: detailResolutionPerPatch
properties.description: Detail Resolution of each patch. A larger value will decrease the number of batches used by detail objects.

properties.name: detailScatterMode
properties.description: Additional resources: DetailScatterMode

properties.name: detailWidth
properties.description: The resolution of the detail data stored in TerrainData.

properties.name: enableHolesTextureCompression
properties.description: Enable the Terrain holes Texture compression.

properties.name: heightmapResolution
properties.description: The size of the heightmap in texels for both the width and height. When setting the heightmap resolution, Unity clamps the value to one of 33, 65, 129, 257, 513, 1025, 2049, or 4097.

properties.name: heightmapScale
properties.description: Returns a Vector3 where the x and z components are the size of each heightmap sample (i.e. the space between two neighboring heightmap samples), and the y component is the entire Terrain's height range in world space.

properties.name: heightmapTexture
properties.description: Returns the heightmap texture.

properties.name: holesResolution
properties.description: Returns the Terrain holes resolution for both the data and the Texture.
